name: Agent Playground
samplePrompt:
You are an agent with the selected TOOLS. If any TOOL MANUALS are provided, follow them closely. Solve the selected PROBLEM and return Markdown only:

1) Plan — 1–2 steps (what tools, in what order).
2) Reasoned tool calls — bullet list (what/why, expected outputs).
3) Final answer — the concise solution.
4) Postmortem — what worked and what to improve next time.

Simulate tool results where necessary; focus on reasoning quality and clarity.

chunks.title: Tool: Web Search
chunks.body: Use web search to gather succinct facts and 2–3 credible sources. Prefer recent dates when relevant. Summarize, cite, and avoid speculation.

chunks.title: Tool: Calculator
chunks.body: Evaluate arithmetic, percentages, and unit conversions. Show intermediate numbers when helpful. Round sensibly.

chunks.title: Tool: File Search
chunks.body: Search a repo or notes by keyword and simple glob patterns. Return file path hints and short matched snippets.

chunks.title: Tool: Code Runner
chunks.body: Execute small code snippets (simulated). Mention language, inputs, stdout/stderr, and any edge cases tested.

chunks.title: Tool: Email Draft
chunks.body: Turn bullets into a short, polite email with a clear ask and sign‑off.

chunks.title: Manual: Web Search
chunks.body: Narrow queries, prefer .gov/.edu/.org when relevant, check recency, list 2–3 sources with titles + URLs, avoid paywalled dead links.

chunks.title: Manual: Calculator
chunks.body: Keep 2–3 significant digits for money; label units; verify sanity (order‑of‑magnitude).

chunks.title: Manual: File Search
chunks.body: Prefer exact phrases first; show short context around hits; warn on possible false positives.

chunks.title: Manual: Code Runner
chunks.body: State assumptions; use small inputs; show stderr if errors; propose a fix if first run fails.

chunks.title: Manual: Email Draft
chunks.body: Keep <120 words; subject clear; call‑to‑action explicit; neutral tone unless asked.

chunks.title: Problem: Research Brief
chunks.body: Create a 120‑word brief on a topic with 2–3 citations. Use Web Search and, if needed, Calculator for any simple numbers.

chunks.title: Problem: Budget Tweak
chunks.body: Given a target monthly savings, compute a revised monthly budget with 3 biggest cuts. Use Calculator; include a simple table.

chunks.title: Problem: Repo Triage
chunks.body: Find likely failing tests and propose a fix. Use File Search; if helpful, show a simulated Code Runner test output.

chunks.title: Problem: Compose Outreach
chunks.body: Draft a brief intro email to a prospect explaining the value prop in 2 lines. Use Email Draft.
